alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chickasaw and west central Monroe Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trebloc, or 8 miles south of Okolona, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aberdeen, Okolona, Trebloc, Prairie, McCondy, Egypt and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
